server.sharedRegions

Class CollectionSiteInterface

  • java.lang.Object
    • server.sharedRegions.CollectionSiteInterface

  • public class CollectionSiteInterface
extends java.lang.Object
    Interface to the Collection Site. It is responsible to validate and process the incoming message, execute the corresponding method on the Collection Site and generate the outgoing message.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CollectionSiteInterface(CollectionSite collectionSite)
      Instantiation of an interface to the Collection Site.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Processing of incoming messages.

    • Method Detail

      • processAndReply

        public Message processAndReply(Message inMessage)
                        throws MessageException
        Processing of incoming messages. Validation, execution of the corresponding method and generation of the outgoing message.
        Parameters:
        inMessage - service request
        Returns:
        service reply
        Throws:
        MessageException - if the incoming message is not valid
